sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>clown</radical> takes a <radical>knife</radical> and <kanji>divide</kanji>s himself. First he divides himself into two pieces, then he's in four pieces, then... oh why won't he stop?!
meaningInfo: Instead of dying, the clown divides into slightly thinner clowns.
readingMnemonic: The clown finally stops trying to <kanji>divide</kanji> himself, and you can't stand to look at all of him. You grab a <reading>bow</reading>ling (<ja>ぼう</ja>) ball and bowl all of his divided parts over!
readingInfo: The many clowns crash to the floor as the bowling ball plows through their... his(?) divided bodies. You can't bear to look anymore.
